resources.string: You have Successfully Purchased This Song
Your Purchased Songs Will Appear here
You Disliked This, We will Try Harder

Allows User to Pick the Genre for the Music and Either Select Discover or Popular Music Discover Music Button Will lead to activity that will play random songs that fit the Genre Popular Music Button Will lead to Activity That Plays songs that are Popular At the time. Purchased Music Button Will Take User to activity That Displays Purchased Songs

Plays the random Song that Fits the Genre provided by the user that is received from MainAcitivity. Allows user to Dislike a Song, Like a song. Both Options will send the Info to the Server VIA API Call to be used in the Song Selection Logic User Can Also Play/Pause or Skip songs. User also has the option of Buy This Song When the button is clicked the User is taken to Purchase Song Activity Where user can buy the song and It will be added to this account and can be either Streamed or Downloaded from the OwnedMusic Acitivity The Songs will be Streamed through any sort of Online Streaming Service

Plays the Song that Fits the Genre provided by the user that is received from MainAcitivity that are Rated Popular on The Charts. Allows user to Dislike a Song, Like a song. Both Options will send the Info to the Server VIA API Call to be used in the Song Selection Logic User Can Also Play/Pause or Skip songs. User also has the option of Buy This Song When the button is clicked the User is taken to Purchase Song Activity Where user can buy the song and It will be added to this account and can be either Streamed or Downloaded from the OwnedMusic Acitivity The Songs will be Streamed through any sort of Online Streaming Service

Will show the list of songs purchased by the user. User Should be able to to download songs from this page, or stream songs from this page. The List of songs will be received from the server that Will be tied to the Account

This Page Shows the Title, Artist and Genre Of the song that is passed from the previous activity The User should be able to purchase the song using his Google Account. The song is then added to the Account on the Server and then later sent to the OwnedSongs activity where user can play it or download it from.
